data.title: Stansted, United Kingdom (EGSS) - Universal Aviation
data.meta_description: FBO & Ground Handlers in London Stansted Airport | Stansted, United Kingdom (EGSS). We offer 24/7 services. Request a quote or call.

EGSS

United Kingdom

London Stansted Airport · Stansted

We are an IS-BAH Stage 2 accredited ground handler at London-Stansted Airport, with a beautiful, modern FBO loaded with amenities. We are also the only handler on the airport that can provide trip support and flight planning services.

IS-BAH Stage 2 Accreditation

Local News and Alerts

Do you have a UK-APD fiscal rep? You’ll need one for passenger flights from the UK. Signing up is fast and easy. Let our regulatory experts help you. >

Downloads

Some Great Reasons to Choose Us

We are an IS-BAH Stage 2 accredited ground handler.

Our modern FBO includes separate departure and arrival lounges, crew lounge and business centre, shower facilities, and meeting rooms.

We are the only handler at Stansted that can provide trip support and flight planning services through our European Operations Centre.

Airport Information

Attribute Detail Airport Name London Stansted Airport ICAO/IATA EGSS / STN Location London, England, United Kingdom LAT / LON N51°53’06.00 / E000°14’06.00 Elevation 348 ft Magnetic Variation 002°W Airport of Entry Yes – AOE Hours of Operation Open 24 hours with restrictions Restrictions – Fuel Available JetA Longest Runway 22/04 (10,003 ft x 151 ft) Approaches ILS / DME ILS ILS available for identified runway RVSM Implemented ACAS/TCAS II Required for turbine engine aircraft with a maximum takeoff weight exceeding 15,000 kilograms or more than 30 pax seats ICAO Annex 16, Chapter II Stage 2 aircraft with a maximum takeoff weight exceeding 34,000 kilograms are not allowed. Exemptions may be issued in exceptional circumstances for heads of state, emergency and medical flights. RNAV5/RNAV10 airspace Implemented 8.33 MHz channel spacing Required Fire Category EGSS: 8 (civil); EGSS: 7 (military) Customs Yes Slots Required Yes Tower Frequency 123.8 Ground Frequency 121.725 Clearance Frequency 121.950 ATIS 127.175
